Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 111st overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Clark Staggs (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2015, off Joshua Zeringue (MON)...
Injured on 5/29/2015 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,128,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/23/2016 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 7/21/2016 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/2/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/3/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $5,795,000 per year...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago on 4/13/2018...
Injured on 10/2/2019 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/4/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago on 8/8/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/7/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Injured on 5/11/2023 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
